price: 57. Akeerâ galto Yallih xaqul addunyâ galtok aysuk raqta, Yallal yeemeneeh kaak meesitak suge marah.
arabic: وَلَأَجۡرُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَكَانُواْ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-ajru al-ākhirati khayrun lilladhīna āmanū wakānū yattaqūna
